question:
Consider the following statements about the Genetic Engineering Appraisal Committee (GEAC):
  1. It has been established under the Ministry of Environment, Forest & Climate Change (MoEFCC) 
  2. It deals with approval of activities involving large scale use of hazardous microorganisms and recombinants
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
Both are correct statements
Genetic Engineering Appraisal Committee (GEAC) has been established under the Ministry of Environment, Forest & Climate Change (MoEFCC). It deals with approval of activities involving large scale use of hazardous microorganisms and recombinants.
